title: Game keeps freezing/lagging. PING and FPS are normal
body: So this has been happening to me for a couples of days now and its really annoying. My game keeps freezing and sometimes I can see champions and minions move but most of the time I can't , couple seconds after the freeze/lag everything speeds up and goes back to normal and then it happens to me again.... I've already repaired my league and it still didn't fix the problem please help!

replies.body: Im having the same problem for about a week now. Normal fps and ping but random problems like champions lagging from place to place every couple minutes. I thought it was packet loss at first. :/

I downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool and im reinstalling league through the repair tool  to. Maybe it will help? https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

The symptoms you've described in your OP are very common among *Packet Loss* or high buffering issues. While this is often caused by routing issues to our servers, I'd first like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this caused any change for you.
I'm trying to enable League Of Legends in the windows firewall but it doesn't even show up... Even when I do browse for more applications or what ever it still doesnt show up

It doesn't show up, even if you browse to the League directories listed below after browsing for more applications?

>* C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.exe
* C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe
* C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\(latest release version - ex: 0.0.0.xx)\deploy\League of Legends.exe
* C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(latest release version - ex: 0.0.0.xx)\deploy\LolClient.exe
* C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher\releases\(latest release version - ex: 0.0.0.xx)\deploy\LoLLauncher.exe
i got like the same problem any tips ?

Mine was fixed by doing the repair. Pretty sure for me it was due to unloaded textures appearing for the first time in games.

But it's worth noting that I still get an average of about 1 error per second in any game I play in my logs even after repairs. Riot needs to fix a ton of stuff.

i have the same problems to day i hate it switch client still does not work
 any tips ?
I have the same problem. FPS and Ping are fine most of the time, but the game just runs slow.
